alert.note: Alert for Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 12:41AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Scott County through 115 AM CST... At 1240 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beauchamp, or 9 miles southwest of Waldron, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Y City... Needmore... Winfield... Olio... Cedar Creek... Harvey... Boles... Parks... Union Hill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western Arkansas.
